00022 static bool isNonCpp(char c){ 
00023   bool retVal=false;
00024   switch(c){
00025   case '-': case '/':
00026     retVal=true;
00027     break;
00028   default:
00029     retVal=false;
00030   }
00031   return retVal;
00032 }

00047 int ExportPulse::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00048    fSetup=setup;
00049    if(!fSetup){
00050       cout<<"Error: TSetupData passed to ExportPulse is NULL..."<<endl;
00051       return 1 ;
00052    }
00053    fTotalEvents=*gTotalEntries;
00054 
00056    if(fOptions){
00057        int num=0;
00058        std::vector<std::string> currentList;
00059        std::vector<EventID_t> event_list;
00060        std::vector<PulseID_t> pulse_list;
00061        std::pair<std::string,std::string> event_pulse_request;
00062        std::string error_type;
00063        // Loop over all options
00064        for(modules::options::OptionsList_t::const_iterator i_opt = fOptions->begin();
00065                 i_opt != fOptions->end(); i_opt++){
00066           // Continue if option is not "all" and not one of the detector names:
00067           if( i_opt->first != "all" && fSetup->GetBankName(i_opt->first)=="") continue;
00068 
00069           // Break the list into items
00070           currentList.clear();
00071           event_list.clear();
00072           pulse_list.clear();
00073           num=fOptions->GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(i_opt->first,currentList);
00074           if(num<=0) continue; // no options were actually specified
00075 
00076           for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator i_request=currentList.begin();
00077                   i_request!=currentList.end();
00078                   i_request++){
00079               event_pulse_request=modules::parser::ParseConstructor(*i_request,'(',')');
00080               // Check things look healthy
00081               if(event_pulse_request.first=="" )error_type="event";
00082               else if( event_pulse_request.second=="")error_type="pulse";
00083               else if( !ParseEventRequest(event_pulse_request.first, event_list)) error_type="event";
00084               else if( !ParsePulseRequest(event_pulse_request.second,pulse_list)) error_type="pulse";
00085               if(error_type != ""){
00086                   cout<<"Skipping badly formatted "<<error_type<<" specification: "<<*i_request<<endl;
00087                   cout<<"event="<<event_pulse_request.first<<", pulse="<<event_pulse_request.second<<endl;
00088                   ShowGuidance();
00089                   continue;
00090               }
00091               // Everything is ok so add this request to the list
00092               for(std::vector<EventID_t>::const_iterator i_event=event_list.begin();
00093                       i_event!=event_list.end();
00094                       i_event++){
00095                  for(std::vector<PulseID_t>::const_iterator i_pulse=pulse_list.begin();
00096                         i_pulse!=pulse_list.end(); i_pulse++){
00097                     AddToConfigRequestList(*i_event,i_opt->first,*i_pulse);
00098                  }
00099               }
00100           }
00101 
00102        }
00103    }
00104    return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 int ExportPulse::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00108   // To be corrected once Phill finishes the event navigator
00109   fGlobalData=gData; 
00110   SetCurrentEventNumber(*gEntryNumber);
00111 
00112   // Check if we have any pulses to draw that were requested through the MODULEs file
00113   LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig();
00114 
00115   // Initialise variables that would be used in the loops
00116   TPulseIsland* pulse;
00117   const PulseIDList_t* requestedPulses;
00118   PulseIslandList* pulseList;
00119 
00120   // Loop over channel that we've been requested to draw a pulse from
00121   for(ChannelPulseIDs_t::const_iterator i_detector=fPulsesToPlot.begin();
00122                   i_detector!=fPulsesToPlot.end();
00123                   i_detector++){
00124      SetCurrentDetectorName(i_detector->first);
00125 
00126      // Get the pulse list for this channel
00127      requestedPulses=&(i_detector->second);
00128      pulseList=GetPulsesFromDetector();
00129 
00130      // Loop over every requested pulse for that channel
00131      for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulseID=requestedPulses->begin();
00132                      i_pulseID!=requestedPulses->end();
00133                      i_pulseID++){
00134              // Update the pulse info struct
00135              SetCurrentPulseID(*i_pulseID);
00136 
00137         // Get the current requested TPI for this channel
00138         try{
00139                 pulse=pulseList->at(*i_pulseID);
00140         }catch(const std::out_of_range& oor){
00141                 cout<<"Skipping out of range pulse: "<<*i_pulseID<<" on detector '"<<i_detector->first<<endl;
00142                 continue;
00143         }
00144 
00145         // Draw the pulse
00146         MakePlot(pulse);
00147      }
00148   }
00149   ClearPulsesToExport();
00150   return 0;
00151 }
00152 
00153 int ExportPulse::MakePlot(const TPulseIsland* pulse)const{
00154         
00155    std::stringstream histname;
00156    histname << "Pulse_" << GetCurrentBankName();
00157    histname << "_" << GetCurrentDetectorName();
00158    histname << "_" << GetCurrentEventNumber();
00159    histname << "_" << GetCurrentPulseID();
00160    std::string hist=histname.str();
00161    // replace all non c++ characters with underscore so we can use the
00162    // histograms in root directly.
00163    std::replace_if(hist.begin(),hist.end(), isNonCpp, '_');
00164 
00165    std::stringstream title;
00166    title << "Pulse " << GetCurrentPulseID();
00167    title << " from event " << GetCurrentEventNumber();
00168    title << " on detector " << GetCurrentDetectorName();
00169    title << " (" << GetCurrentBankName()<<")";
00170 
00171    // Print some stuff if wanted
00172    if(Debug()){
00173         cout<<"Plotting pulse "<<GetCurrentPulseID()<<" for event "<<GetCurrentEventNumber();
00174         cout<<", detector '"<<GetCurrentDetectorName()<<"' ["<<histname.str()<<"]"<<endl;
00175    }
00176 
00177    size_t num_samples = pulse->GetPulseLength();
00178    TH1F* hPulse = new TH1F(hist.c_str(), title.str().c_str(), num_samples,0,num_samples);
00179    
00180    for ( size_t i=0;i <num_samples; ++i) {
00181      hPulse->SetBinContent(i+1, pulse->GetSamples().at(i));
00182    }
00183    hPulse->Write();
00184 
00185    return 0;
00186 }

00188 PulseIslandList* ExportPulse::GetPulsesFromDetector(std::string bank){
00189    if(bank=="") bank=this->GetCurrentBankName();
00190    return &fGlobalData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[bank];
00191 }

00193 void ExportPulse::ShowGuidance(){
00194 // Only show guidance once
00195   if(fGuidanceShown) return;
00196   fGuidanceShown=true;
00197   cout<<"Requests to draw a pulse should be formatted as event(pulse),"<<endl;
00198   cout<<" where event and pulse are the numbers of each event and pulse you wish to draw"<<endl;
00199          //", a range (specified by A-Z, where A and Z are the first and last value of the range),"
00200          //" or a number of random events to select (specified by ~N where N is the number of events)";
00201 }

00203 bool ExportPulse::ParseEventRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& event_list){
00204         return ParseRequest(input,event_list,"event",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00205 }
00206 
00207 bool ExportPulse::ParsePulseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list){
00208         return ParseRequest(input,list,"pulse",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00209 }
00210 
00211 bool ExportPulse::ParseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list, const std::string& type, Long64_t lower_limit, Long64_t upper_limit){
00212         // Strip all whitespace
00213         modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(input);
00214 
00215         // Check if input string contains a number,
00216         if(modules::parser::IsNumber(input)){
00217                 int event = modules::parser::GetNumber(input);
00218                 if (event >=lower_limit && event < upper_limit ){
00219                         list.push_back(event);
00220                 } else {
00221                         cout<<"Requested "<<type<<", "<<event<<" is out of range."<<endl;
00222                         cout<<"Acceptable values are: ["<<lower_limit<<","<<upper_limit<<"[."<<endl;
00223                         return false;
00224                 }
00225                 return true;
00226         }
00227         // Future Ideas:
00228         // Check if input contains a range,
00229         // Check if input contains a random request
00230         return false;
00231 }

00233 void ExportPulse::LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig(){
00234           // 7) In Process entry, invoke a method to check if there were requested or a pulse on a channel in this event
00235           //    and load them into fPulsesToPlot;
00236 
00237         for(EventChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel=fRequestedByConfig.begin();
00238                         i_channel!=fRequestedByConfig.end(); i_channel++){
00239                 EventPulseIDList_t::iterator i_event=i_channel->second.find(GetCurrentEventNumber());
00240                 if(i_event!=i_channel->second.end()){
00241                         for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulse=i_event->second.begin();
00242                                         i_pulse!=i_event->second.end(); i_pulse++){
00243                                 AddToExportList(i_channel->first,*i_pulse);
00244                         }
00245                 }
00246         }
00247         
00248         // Check if all channels were requested
00249 }

00251 void ExportPulse::ClearPulsesToExport(){
00252   ChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel;
00253   for (i_channel=fPulsesToPlot.begin();i_channel!=fPulsesToPlot.end();i_channel++){
00254                   i_channel->second.clear();
00255   }
00256   fPulsesToPlot.clear();
00257 }
